unit: Unit 1: Introduction to Databases and DBMS

questions.question: What is a Database Management System (DBMS)? Explain its advantages over traditional file systems.
Explain the three-level architecture of DBMS (External, Conceptual, Internal) with a neat diagram.
What are the different types of database users? Explain the role of Database Administrator (DBA).
Explain the concepts of Data Independence. Differentiate between Logical and Physical Data Independence.
What is an Entity-Relationship (ER) Model? Explain the basic components of ER diagrams with examples.
Define the following with examples: Entity, Attribute, Relationship, Primary Key, Foreign Key.
Explain different types of attributes in ER model: Simple, Composite, Derived, Multi-valued.
What are the different types of relationships in ER model? Explain with cardinality constraints.
Draw an ER diagram for a University Database System with entities: Student, Course, Instructor, Department.
Explain the difference between DDL, DML, and DCL with examples.
What is a weak entity? How is it represented in an ER diagram? Give an example.
Explain the process of converting an ER diagram to Relational Schema with an example.
